com.example.qrquest

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.qrquest.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines new players (end-users)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      This method defines a default new player profile

      This method defines a new player profile with basic attributes

      This method defined a new player profile with a username.

        This method defines a new player profile with basic attributes
        Parameters:
        hasScanned: - the number of QR Code scanned by the player
        highestScore: - the highest QR Code score of the player
        region: - the region of the player
        score: - the total QR Code score of the player
        emailAddress: - the email address of the player
        username: - the username of the player
